title: Hint
text: Use Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the net force and tension in the cable during deceleration.

title: Hint
text: Resolve the forces into their $$x$$ and $$y$$ components to find the total force on the Achilles tendon. Consider the angles and directions of the forces.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Resolve the forces into their $$x$$ and $$y$$ components based on the given angles. Step 2: Use the component formulas to find the total force on the Achilles tendon. Step 3: Consider the type of movement that could be caused by this force. Step 4: Clearly show all calculations and units.
